content:
Sthuthi, anuthaapakkaar mumpil
Vaathil thurakkum-raajaavaameesho
/tpaatha-kiyaam nyaanarththhippoo;
/tnalvara-daanatthaal modam.
Nalkuka bhaavuka daathaave!
Theeraname nyaan-ninnude kinnaramaay.

Vaanavanaam thaathaa-yaachikkunnadiyaar
Ee shushrooshaye e-ttaardratha thonnenam.

Vaanavar thaanneeshaa- maanavar than-gathiye,
Ee shushrooshaye e-ttaardratha thonnenam.

Akhilam nyaanaaraanyittum
Daivabhayatthe mikachonnum
Nyaan darshichilla-thal snehatthaale
Dhaarmmikanaam yauseppaarnnu-misrem raajathvam
Mahithan moosha vibhaagichaan-vadiyaal vaaridhiye
/thaananiyaadyanmaarathinaal-
/tagniyilninnum rakshitharaay
Thangkatthekkaallathu kaamyam;
Madhuvilumathu madhuram paaram
Daivaaraadhanaye-snehippon dhanyan.

Kadaloram vazhi pokumpoll
Anyonyam vettitthinnum
Mathsyatthe darshi-chaarnnenaashcharyam.
Vismayasahitham nilkkumpoll-chintichevam nyaan
Bhuvane thammil vizhungunno-rundee marthyarilum,
/tnyaayavidhikkettheedaattha
/tjeeviye entinu nindippoo;
Kanmumpil vidhikandaalum
Parane vizhungum martthyanmaar
Kuttakkaaravare - elkkunnon dhanyan.

Vrtthikallaal kartthaave! Nyaan
Nin kopatthinu paathramathaay
Karunaabdhe! Nee kopikkaa;
Susthhirame nin nirmmalatha.

Nibi vaakyam pol janamellaam
Jalabindukkallkkoppamathaam
Nairmmalyatthe bhajnyippaan
Thinmaykkengane saadhikkum.

Praarththhana ketteedunnone!
Yaachana nalkeedunnone!
Praarththhanayil preethyaasadayam
Yaachanaye nalkeedaname.

Neethijnyanmaar-maddhye kashdam!-nyaan thunayatton.
/tsanmaargam nyaan sheelichilla.
/thaa! Nyaananyan-thal perunnaallil;
En dushkrthyam-paayicheedunnavareennenne.

/T(pattakkaarundengkil thudarnnu dhoopapraarththhanakall nadatthunnu. Illaatthapaksham kuriyelaayistton .. Kuri.. Kuri.. Nyangallude kartthaave! Nyangalludemel anugraham cheyyunname ennathum kartthu praarththhanayum cholli avasaanippikkunnu.)
(saadhaaranayaayi ivide dhoopapraarththhana avasaanikkunnu. Velllliyaazhcha muthalaaya sleebaaye smarikkunna prathyeka divasangallil sleebaayude kookkiliyonum chollendathaakunnu.)
